title: Alec Baldwin Fired Live Round on Set of ‘Rust,’ Sheriff Says
sub_head: Santa Fe County sheriff details findings from ongoing investigation into fatal incident on movie set at Bonanza Creek Ranch
body:
SANTA FE, N. M.—Alec Baldwin fired a live round during a rehearsal of the film “Rust,” which killed the movie’s cinematographer and wounded the director, the sheriff for Santa Fe County said Wednesday.
Sheriff Adan Mendoza said a bullet recovered from director Joel Souza’s shoulder is believed to have been fired from a Colt revolver by Mr. Baldwin while rehearsing a scene from the movie.
